- The board now reads J♠6♣7♦T♠4♥
- Any 9 now has the straight (8-9-T-J-Q)
- Many 2-pair combinations now beat me (J-T, J-7, T-7, T-6, etc.)
- Even pocket pairs 99+ crush me

Given P1's turn bet of 70 into a 100 pot, they likely have:
- A straight (very possible)
- Trips or two pair (J-J, T-T, 7-7, 6-6, J-T, etc.)
- Overpair like QQ+

Since I'm only getting ~3.4:1 on a call (70 to win 240) and I'm likely behind most of their range, this is a clear fold situation.

[Fold]
